body:
**Version**:
v1.10.0-alpha.0.821+a505d1bc7854c0-dirty

**What happened**:
When enable EventRateLimit with `configuration` like below, apiserver can't start and get error
`Error: failed to initialize admission: no kind is registered for the type runtime.Unknown`

```
kind: AdmissionConfiguration
apiVersion: apiserver.k8s.io/v1alpha1
plugins:
- name: "EventRateLimit"
  configuration:
    apiVersion: eventratelimit.admission.k8s.io/v1alpha1
    kind: Configuration
    limits:
    - type: Namespace
      qps: 50
      burst: 100
      cacheSize: 2000
    - type: User
      qps: 10
      burst: 50
```
But it can be start success when use `path` in configuration
```
# cat eventratelimit.config 
kind: AdmissionConfiguration
apiVersion: apiserver.k8s.io/v1alpha1
plugins:
- name: "EventRateLimit"
  path: /data/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/event.yaml

# cat event.yaml 
apiVersion: eventratelimit.admission.k8s.io/v1alpha1
kind: Configuration
limits:
- type: Namespace
  qps: 2
  burst: 3
  cacheSize: 2000
- type: User
  qps: 10
  burst: 50
```
**Error log**:
```
[root@ip-172-18-13-114 kubernetes]# cat /tmp/kube-apiserver.log 
I1211 04:22:29.972582   12583 feature_gate.go:184] feature gates: map[RotateKubeletServerCertificate:false DebugContainers:false TaintBasedEvictions:false HugePages:false KubeletConfigFile:false TaintNodesByCondition:false ExpandPersistentVolumes:false DevicePlugins:false AllAlpha:false DynamicKubeletConfig:false ResourceLimitsPriorityFunction:false MountContainers:false PVCProtection:false PersistentLocalVolumes:false MountPropagation:false CustomPodDNS:false Accelerators:false EnableEquivalenceClassCache:false LocalStorageCapacityIsolation:false CSIPersistentVolume:false Initializers:false BlockVolume:false ExperimentalCriticalPodAnnotation:false CPUManager:false VolumeScheduling:false ServiceNodeExclusion:false PodPriority:false APIResponseCompression:false]
I1211 04:22:29.972708   12583 server.go:121] Version: v1.10.0-alpha.0.831+bb72237375dfb3-dirty
I1211 04:22:29.973064   12583 server.go:651] Initializing deserialization cache size based on 0MB limit
I1211 04:22:29.973086   12583 server.go:670] Initializing cache sizes based on 0MB limit
I1211 04:22:30.166122   12583 storage_factory.go:278] storing { serviceaccounts} in v1, reading as __internal from storagebackend.Config{Type:"etcd3", Prefix:"/registry", ServerList:[]string{"http://127.0.0.1:2379"}, KeyFile:"", CertFile:"", CAFile:"", Quorum:true, Paging:true, DeserializationCacheSize:1000, Codec:runtime.Codec(nil), Transformer:value.Transformer(nil), CompactionInterval:300000000000}
I1211 04:22:30.166189   12583 storage_factory.go:278] storing { secrets} in v1, reading as __internal from storagebackend.Config{Type:"etcd3", Prefix:"/registry", ServerList:[]string{"http://127.0.0.1:2379"}, KeyFile:"", CertFile:"", CAFile:"", Quorum:true, Paging:true, DeserializationCacheSize:1000, Codec:runtime.Codec(nil), Transformer:value.Transformer(nil), CompactionInterval:300000000000}
I1211 04:22:30.168025   12583 feature_gate.go:184] feature gates: map[Accelerators:false ExperimentalCriticalPodAnnotation:false ExpandPersistentVolumes:false PersistentLocalVolumes:false ServiceNodeExclusion:false CPUManager:false TaintNodesByCondition:false RotateKubeletServerCertificate:false DevicePlugins:false PVCProtection:false EnableEquivalenceClassCache:false VolumeScheduling:false KubeletConfigFile:false MountContainers:false LocalStorageCapacityIsolation:false BlockVolume:false APIResponseCompression:false HugePages:false AllAlpha:false ResourceLimitsPriorityFunction:false MountPropagation:false CSIPersistentVolume:false Initializers:true PodPriority:false DebugContainers:false DynamicKubeletConfig:false CustomPodDNS:false TaintBasedEvictions:false]
I1211 04:22:30.168057   12583 initialization.go:90] enabled Initializers feature as part of admission plugin setup
Error: failed to initialize admission: no kind is registered for the type runtime.Unknown

```

title: EventRateLimit admission controller can't start with configuration format
